2096210.name: Gloop
2096210.description:
Gloop is a semi open-world platformer, where you play as a parasitic slime. Use your tendrils to infect a wide range of creatures each with their own mechanics, to traverse and take over the landscape.

-Explore an alien world with a living ecosystem

-Traverse a unique set of biomes, in non - linear progression using creatures you infect.

-Survive getting eaten by the locals

Gloop is Currently in an early stage of development.
2096210.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
